sqlMap.select: SELECT A.DEPT_ID, B.DEPT_NM FROM BSC_SC_DEPT_MAPPING A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_DEPTINFO B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID WHERE (YEAR, SC_DEPT_ID) IN (SELECT YEAR, SC_DEPT_ID FROM BSC_METRIC WHERE (METRIC_GRP_ID, YEAR) IN (SELECT METRIC_GRP_ID, YEAR FROM BSC_METRIC WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND METRIC_ID = #findMetricId#) AND DELETE_DT IS NULL) AND OULEVEL < 2

select.isEqual: SELECT A.YEAR, A.MON, A.INSP_KIND_TC, A.CNT, A.BR_CD, B.DEPT_NM, A.INSP_QTY, A.INSP_KIND_TC_NM, A.STIC_SML_TC_NM FROM ( SELECT SUMM_YY AS YEAR, SUMM_MM AS MON, INSP_KIND_TC, INSP_QTY, BR_CD, INSP_KIND_TC_NM, STIC_SML_TC_NM, CASE WHEN INSP_KIND_TC = '03' THEN SUM (INSP_QTY) * 26.2 WHEN INSP_KIND_TC = '05' THEN SUM (INSP_QTY) * 9.8 WHEN INSP_KIND_TC = '07' THEN SUM (INSP_QTY) * 26.2 END CNT FROM V_GHF0221D_001 WHERE ROLE_TC = '31' AND INSP_KIND_TC IN ('03', '05', '07') AND SUMM_YY = #findYear# AND SUMM_MM = #findMon# AND INSP_QTY > 0 GROUP BY SUMM_YY, SUMM_MM, INSP_KIND_TC, BR_CD, INSP_QTY, INSP_KIND_TC_NM, STIC_SML_TC_NM, LAW_TC_NM UNION ALL SELECT EDU_YY, EDU_MON, '10' INSP_KIND_TC, EDU_PESN, DEPT_CD AS BR_CD, 'N' INSP_KIND_TC_NM, EDU_TARG_DTL_TC_NM, SUM (EDU_PESN) * 10.3 FROM V_GGL0102D_001 WHERE EDU_YY = #findYear# AND EDU_MON = #findMon# AND EDU_PESN > 0 GROUP BY EDU_YY, EDU_MON, EDU_PESN, DEPT_CD, EDU_TARG_DTL_TC_NM) A LEFT OUTER JOIN V_DEPTINFO B ON A.BR_CD = B.DEPT_ID AND A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.MON = #findMon# ORDER BY YEAR, MON, INSP_KIND_TC, STIC_SML_TC_NM

sqlMap.select: SELECT DEPT_ID FROM ( SELECT DEPT_ID FROM BSC_SC_DEPT_MAPPING WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND SC_DEPT_ID = #findScDeptCd# ORDER BY DEPT_ID ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT A.ITEM_CD, B.CAL_TYPE_COL_NM FROM BSC_SYSTEM_ITEM A , BSC_CAL_TYPE_COL B WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND B.METRIC_ID = #findMetricId# AND B.INSERT_GUBUN = '01' ORDER BY B.CAL_TYPE_COL_NM
